forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
